title.rendered: Accor unveils its first Handwritten Collection address in the United States

content.rendered:
HOTEL STRATFORD SAN FRANCISCO – HANDWRITTEN COLLECTION WILL OPEN ITS DOORS TO GUESTS THIS SUMMER

SAN FRANCISCO, CA, May 6, 2024 /PRNewswire/ – San Francisco, a city renowned for its commercial hubs and cultural sites, will become the first destination in the United States for one of Accor’s newest brands, Handwritten Collection. Owned and operated by San Francisco based Frame Ventures, Hotel Stratford is a charming European-style boutique property set against the backdrop of bustling Union Square on the renowned Powell Street cable car line. The property becomes Accor’s third hotel in San Francisco, joining the Fairmont properties atop Nob Hill and at Ghirardelli Square.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/accor-unveils-its-first-handwritten-collection-address-in-the-united-states-302136211.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
